Question: Protests are ineffective for changing policy
Citizens should be allowed to protest anywhere they want on public land
A country is best led by fewer political parties, in order to be more efficient
Taxes on businesses should remain low in order to free up more money for expanding businesses, hiring more employees, and therefore, decreasing unemployment and lowering prices for consumers
Starting a business should be made easy in order to create a healthier economy for everyone
People who make large profits should be taxed more than small businesses with less profit, and the income redistributed to citizens who make less in wages
Licensing is ultimately another cost that hurts consumers because business owners have to raise their prices to afford the extra cost
Contracts should be enforced by law to protect private property owners, such as business and homeowners
Employers should be required by law to hire certain people of different races, religions, sexuality, or disability, in order to create diversity in the workplace
The government should encourage innovation in the economy by cutting regulations and offering tax breaks to business professionals
Loans should be given out more rather than less liberally in order to encourage employers to hire more people, reducing the level of unemployment in the country
A central bank should regulate the amount of credit and inflation for the stability of the economy
Charging interest on a loan should be illegal
Freedom of speech means that even neo-Nazis should be allowed to march and speak their minds in public
Access to media should be unregulated by government, even if the information from the media causes unrest among citizens
Tariffs are necessary to keep money in the nation's economy
It should be illegal to own a foreign investment because it reduces money flowing into the national economy
Free trade agreements, where taxes will be reduced or eliminated when trading with certain selected countries, increases competition, lowering prices for consumers overall
If you buy from your local community, it gives more money to the local community and therefore, raises quality of life there
Foreigners should have the freedom to visit as long as they can pass a criminal background check
Foreign powers should be punished for interfering with elections by refusing to trade with them
There should be a 3 month waiting period for finalizing a divorce, in order to encourage families to stay together
Same sex married couples should have the same legal rights as hetereosexual married couples
Patriotism is important in order to create solidarity among citizens in a nation
Working overtime should be made illegal in order to protect employees from overwork
Women who have a gap in their employment history due to child rearing should still be paid the same as a man for the same job position
It should be legally easy to hire people and difficult to fire them in order to protect workers
Banks should all be owned by the government, less fraud occurs than if banks are made private
All employees should be paid the same amount of money regardless of their race, religion, sexuality, gender, or disability
A minimum wage means business owners have to raise their prices, reducing the number of products and services a consumer can buy
Unions should be formed, even if it means businesses have to charge more for goods and services, due to instituting higher wages and extra overtime pay
Employers should pay based on the merit of the employees' work on an individual basis, even if it means more men than women are getting raises
Sex that is paid for, between consenting adults, should be made legal

It is not reasonable to expect police to not be corrupt due to having power over citizens by their right to be violent toward people who could be potential threats to the safety of themselves and others
It should be a woman's right to decide if they want an abortion
A human life is killed when an abortion takes place, and is therefore murder
A person should be able to choose when they die, such as cases of suicide or euthanasia
Loyalty to one's country is vital to a secure, strong national defense
The government should intervene militarily in any country where genocide is occuring
If necessary, terrorists' passports should be taken away
There should be more rather than less restrictions and regulations on the sale of property in order to protect homeowners from getting ripped off by sellers
Private property should be abolished and replaced by government ownership
A country or state should have one official religion, in order to grow cultural cohesion
If a business commits fraud, the people involved should pay a fine to those who were taken advantage of, but not go to jail because the crime was not violent
If congress is slow and inefficient, the president should be allowed to do what he wants, regardless of what congress says
Democracy is the best system of governance for protecting citizens from oppression
A system of laws that are enforced by the judicial branch is necessary to keep citizens safe and secure
Obeying the law and authority figures creates and safe and just society
A country's constitution should be upheld to the letter and historical context of the law, it is not open to interpretation
Violent force, including from police, should be punishable by law

Government should make laws for the good of the people of a country, as a whole, even if it means sacrificing some liberties, such as the right to have more than one child when overpopulation is a national crisis
Torture in necessary to extract information from terrorists who wouldn't give away information otherwise
The worst criminals, those who have committed murder or molestation, should be executed
The government should regulate or ban certain drugs regardless of how harmful they are
Surveillance on all citizens is ok if it means it will prevent terrorist attacks
Some censorship is necessary in the press if it is in the interests of national security
Police and military intervention is necessary in cases where security is needed, such as when a natural disaster or riot occurs
An authoritarian government is necessary in cases where there is a lack of security
War is sometimes necessary, but only if a country is attacked first
Cooperation and compromise is necessary to securing peace, versus a strong leader who makes executive decisions
If a nation can prevent a terrorist attack, they should intervene militarily in other countries
The income tax on the highest earners should pay at least 50% of their income in taxes
In order to encourage alternative energy sources, the government should pay people to set up solar panels, even if it means higher taxes
A small government is an efficient government
A large national budget is necessary in order to provide a safety net for citizens most in need
A tax should be put in place to pay for healthcare for every citizen

If a tax is put in place to pay for healthcare for every citizen, people and companies will take advantage of the healthcare system by charging more money for medical goods and services, meaning taxes will need to be raised to pay for the inflated costs
Pollution taxes and fines on business protect citizens from harm overall, even if it means sacrificing some of the economy's health
The more money rich people have, the less money poor people have
The government inflating the currency a little is necessary to reduce unemployment and increase capital/credit for business owners
Economic growth is important to an economy in order to raise the standard of living for its citizens
